mapper.update:
UPDATE `project_deploy_info` SET
`project_id` = #{set.projectId},
`host_ip` = #{set.hostIp},
`docker_env` = #{set.dockerEnv},
`deploy_mode` = #{set.deployMode},
`container_name` = #{set.containerName},
`git_branch` = #{set.gitBranch},
`nexus_target_url` = #{set.nexusTargetUrl},
`docker_image_name` = #{set.dockerImageName},
`entrypoint` = #{set.entrypoint},
`docker_mount` = #{set.dockerMount},
`docker_link` = #{set.dockerLink},
`is_valid` = #{set.isValid},
`is_delete` = #{set.isDelete},
`create_time` = #{set.createTime},
`create_user` = #{set.createUser},
`update_time` = #{set.updateTime},
`update_user` = #{set.updateUser},
`id` in
#{item} and
`id` >= #{where.idSt} and
`id` <= #{where.idEd} and
`project_id` in
#{item} and
(
`Project_id` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Project_id` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`host_ip` in
#{item} and
(
`Host_ip` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Host_ip` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`docker_env` in
#{item} and
(
`Docker_env` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Docker_env` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`deploy_mode` in
#{item} and
`deploy_mode` >= #{where.deployModeSt} and
`deploy_mode` <= #{where.deployModeEd} and
`container_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Container_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Container_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`git_branch` in
#{item} and
(
`Git_branch` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Git_branch` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`nexus_target_url` in
#{item} and
(
`Nexus_target_url` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Nexus_target_url` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`docker_image_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Docker_image_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Docker_image_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`entrypoint` in
#{item} and
(
`Entrypoint` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Entrypoint` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`docker_mount` in
#{item} and
(
`Docker_mount` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Docker_mount` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`docker_link` in
#{item} and
(
`Docker_link` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Docker_link` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`is_valid` in
#{item} and
`is_valid` >= #{where.isValidSt} and
`is_valid` <= #{where.isValidEd} and
`is_delete` in
#{item} and
`is_delete` >= #{where.isDeleteSt} and
`is_delete` <= #{where.isDeleteEd} and
`create_time` in
#{item} and
`create_time` >= #{where.createTimeSt} and
`create_time` <= #{where.createTimeEd} and
`create_user` in
#{item} and
(
`Create_user` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Create_user` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`update_time` in
#{item} and
`update_time` >= #{where.updateTimeSt} and
`update_time` <= #{where.updateTimeEd} and
`update_user` in
#{item} and
(
`Update_user` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(

) and
